channel.title: Constant Disconnects
channel.description:
#### What happened?
I'm disconnected maybe two out of three games. I'm playing on a Mac laptop in windowed mode, in case that's relevant. I get the trying to reconnect screen and then after maybe a minute the game drops me back to the main menu.
My internet seems to work the whole time. I can switch to the web browser and it will load a page immediately.
v1.0.10c1

item.title: Constant Disconnects
item.dc:creator: cowslaw
item.description:
What happened?

I’m disconnected maybe two out of three games. I’m playing on a Mac laptop in windowed mode, in case that’s relevant. I get the trying to reconnect screen and then after maybe a minute the game drops me back to the main menu.

My internet seems to work the whole time. I can switch to the web browser and it will load a page immediately.

v1.0.10c1
